title: Base on Connector 365 Online Help

items.title: First Steps
items.content_html:
First steps with the Connector 365 Base App

Here you will find all help and learning resources about the test version, installation and purchase of the Connector 365 Base App.

Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu.

In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page.
